channel.title: New project
channel.description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [u][b][i]Update 1[/i][/b][/u] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I recently found some gun models that looks pretty cool which gave me the idea of turning rs into a apocalypse type world that has zombies, privates, and more...i know this has been done before, but when i tried to play it it didn't work :| . So i decided devolve my own and have tons of quest and more. I'll be updating this page as I go along. I'll be changing the skills on runescape to match up with the whole gameplay of this ps, so don't worry I have some ideas that might work out.
Done Doing right now Haven't started
Found a home/starting area
add guns and knifes work on starting area
npcs combat xp rates
I'll be updating my goals but this is just to start off. btw I'm using a fully clean delta to make this...I know and yes i plan on updating it from delta to something better but for now I need to learn how everything is going to play out for this idea :)
Any ideas from you guys will help me get ideas on what to put in this new project ;D ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
